extendedInfo.description: Instantly post items for sale on the Internet with your mobile phone or tablet. Tap to take full-size photos, tap in a title, price, description, and thatâs it, you now have your own web store with your items for sale. The TapToSell mobile app and website do all the work automatically!Excellent for local classifieds or eBay. At TapToSell your items last forever in your store, so you can list or re-list them on other sites easily.Share your store URL on Facebook or Twitter to let your friends have first dibs.  Social selling is easy!Win Storage Wars. Get those items posted for sale right after you buy.Sell appliances, antiques, bikes, boats, books, computers, furniture, jewelry, tools, arts and crafts, auto parts, baby and kid stuff, cars, trucks, motorcycles, DVDs/media, electronics, musical instruments and apartment rentals. Anything you can sell - list it online instantly with TapToSell.Have fun selling!

reviews.title: Keeps closing down :-(
reviews.comment: I posted 1 item and when I try to look at it, it closes down the page! Please fix!!!
reviews.author: Greaserdoll666

reviews.title: Not a good tool
reviews.comment: Let\'s me post, but won\'t let me click on the items I posted, just closes the app when I try.
reviews.author: Lance Tyree

reviews.title: Neat concept... but...
reviews.comment: Needs a lot of work. As is- junk app. Constant restarting, dollars only - no change option. Forgets pictures when publishing, forgets prices when publishing (sets random items to \"free\") and has zero settings. (Logout... is NOT a setting.) That said... awesome concept. Tons of potential here, enjoyable interface, and free app to boot. I\'ll hang onto this one and wait for updates. Don\'t give up!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: TRY TO MAKE THIS GLOBAL.LIKE LET MORE PEOPLE BE ABLE TO VIEW.

reviews.comment: Good idea but not on the follow thru. Eggdrop lets you upload easier and to see how many ppl have viewed ur item.  FC a lot or just plain doesn\'t upload pics.
